level.heading: "Proof of financial responsibility for the future", "proof", or "proof of financial responsibility" defined.
level.text: The terms "proof of financial responsibility for the future" or "proof" or "proof of financial responsibility" as used in this chapter shall mean: Proof that the motor vehicle subject to registration or reciprocity under the laws of the District of Columbia is an insured motor vehicle under the provisions of the Compulsory/No-Fault Motor Vehicle Insurance Act of 1982.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 4-155
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-155, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 50-1301.03.

level.heading: References in Text
level.text: The "Compulsory/No-Fault Motor Vehicle Insurance Act of 1982", referred to at the end of the section, is D.C. Law 4-155.
